GENERAL.store-limit: Size of the app reached. No action allowed

INTRO.sl1Descr: To begin, select your currency. You will be able to change the currency and language later at any time in the application settings
INTRO.sl2Descr: Your data is only yours. We store the information directly on your phone, without going through external servers. This makes it possible to use the app even without internet
INTRO.sl3Descr: With Monekin, you can finally achieve the financial independence you want so much. You will have graphs, budgets, tips, statistics and much more about your money.

LOGIN.not_verified: User not verified. Check your inbox
LOGIN.password-validator: * Mínimo 8 carácteres y al menos un número

REGISTER.terms1: I've read and I accept the
REGISTER.terms_not_accepted: You should accept the terms of use

RESET-PASSWORD.description: Enter your email below and we will send you instructions to recover your password

VERIFY-EMAIL.title: Check your inbox
VERIFY-EMAIL.description: We have sent a verification email to your email with a link. Click on that link and log in again. Check the Spam folder if you can't find the message.

TABS.should-create-account.message: You must create an account before you can start creating transactions

TAB1.title: Home
TAB1.empty-expenses: It looks like you don't have any transactions for this period yet. Add one by clicking the '+' button at the bottom
TAB1.healthy-text1: Wow, it seems that you have managed to save a {{value}}% of your income during this period. It seems that you are already an expert. Keep it up!
TAB1.healthy-text2: Congratulations, you have managed to save {{value}}% of your income during this period. Visit the analysis tab to see where you can save even more!
TAB1.healthy-text3: Congratulations, you have managed to save {{value}}% of your income during this period. However, we believe that you can still do much more, you can!
TAB1.healthy-text4: Wow, you haven't managed to save anything during this period :( Visit the analysis tab to see where your financial weaknesses are.

TAB2.empty: No transactions found to display here. Add a transaction by clicking the '+' button at the bottom

FORM.description-info: Adding a note will help you find this transaction faster in the future

TRANSFER.need-two-accounts.warning.message: At least two accounts are needed to perform this action. If you need to adjust or edit the current balance of this account, click the edit button

TYPES.title: Account type
TYPES.warning: Once the type of account has been chosen, it cannot be changed in the future
TYPES.normal.descr: Useful to record your day-to-day finances. It is the most common account, it allows you to add expenses, income...
TYPES.saving.descr: You will only be able to add and withdraw money from it from other accounts. Perfect to start saving money

FORM.name: Account name
FORM.already-exists: There is already another one with the same name, please write another

SHARE.title: Share this account
SHARE.description: Enter the ID of the user in question to share this account. The user will be able to see, add, edit or modify all the transactions of this account

DELETE.warning-text: This action will delete this account and all its transactions

RECURRENT-TRANSACTIONS.title: Recurrent transactions
RECURRENT-TRANSACTIONS.empty: It looks like you don't have any recurring transactions. Create a monthly, yearly, or weekly recurring transaction and it will appear here

DETAILS.title: Transaction details
DETAILS.pause-message: This action will terminate this transaction today, and no more payments will be made from now on. Payments made before today will not be removed from the balance
DETAILS.delete-message: This action is irreversible and will delete all your payments from the balance

CATEGORIES.new-category-incomplete: Please complete all the fields. If you haven't chosen an icon yet, choose one
CATEGORIES.already-exists: Category already exists. Maybe you want to edit it
CATEGORIES.name: Category name
CATEGORIES.delete-warning-message: This action will delete all the transactions of this category

BUDGETS.title: Budgets
BUDGETS.no-budgets: There seem to be no budgets to display in this section. Start by creating a budget by clicking the button below
BUDGETS.delete-warning: This action is irreversible. Categories and transactions referring to this quote will not be deleted

DETAILS.title: Budget Details
DETAILS.no-transactions: It seems that you have not made any expenses related to this budget

GO-PREMIUM.title: Choose a plan
GO-PREMIUM.description: Check the benefits of all our premium plans. Choose one and cancel whenever you want.
GO-PREMIUM.change-plan: To change plans you must first cancel previous subscriptions and wait for them to expire
GO-PREMIUM.return-to-free: To return to the free plan cancel the subscriptions you currently have active
GO-PREMIUM.current-plan: This is your current plan. You can cancel without obligation at any time
GO-PREMIUM.current-free-plan: You are here on the basic plan right now

EXPORT.title: Export Data
EXPORT.description: Keep a backup of all your accounts, budgets, transactions, settings...
EXPORT.csv.description: Export all your transactions to a .csv file. With this file you will be able to carry out deep analyzes on other platforms such as Excel or Python
EXPORT.csv.note: Note: You will not be able to import your data into Monekin with CSV files, to do so use the 'Import data' box
EXPORT.success_in_documents: File successfully saved to Internal Storage/Documents
EXPORT.error: Error downloading the file. Please contact the developer via lozin.technologies@gmail.com

IMPORT.title: Import data
IMPORT.description: Replace all data currently in the app with data you have previously saved
IMPORT.longDescription: If you have already used our application before, you may have a backup saved on your device with the name Monekin_backup_YEAR_MONTH_DAY.json. If you prefer, you can perform this data import later. Before uninstalling this application or changing mobile always remember to make this backup

GUIDE.title: Guide on how to import/export your data

SETTINGS.title: Settings
SETTINGS.edit-categories.description: Create and edit categories to your liking
SETTINGS.data.description: Download your data in different formats or import it
SETTINGS.legal.description: Review legal aspects of the app, such as licenses or privacy
SETTINGS.contact.description: Report errors or leave us your questions and suggestions
SETTINGS.change-currency: Change the currency of the app
SETTINGS.delete-all-message1: Are you sure you want to continue? All your data will be permanently deleted and cannot be recovered
SETTINGS.delete-all-message2: By deleting an account you will delete all your stored personal data. Your accounts, transactions, budgets and categories will be deleted and cannot be recovered. Do you agree?

LICENSES.title: Licenses
LICENSES.text1: The icons of this app have been extracted from
